name: Machboos laham
short_description: Kuwait's beloved national dish features tender lamb simmered with aromatic spices, served atop fluffy basmati rice, fried onions, and sweet raisins. A delightful blend of flavors awaits!

name: Mumawwash
short_description: A cherished Kuwaiti classic, features fragrant rice infused with saut√©ed mung beans, onions, and a vibrant blend of spices like cinnamon, turmeric, and saffron for a delightful flavor experience.

name: Gers ogaily
short_description: Kuwait's beloved sponge cake, baked in large bundt pans, boasts fragrant notes of saffron, cardamom, and rose water. A festive treat that celebrates tradition and sweetens every occasion.

name: Khanfaroosh
short_description: Crispy on the outside and tender within, these delightful deep-fried treats blend wheat and rice flour with a hint of sweetness. A beloved dessert in Kuwait, Khanfaroosh brings a taste of Gulf tradition to every bite.

name: Mutabbaq samak
short_description: Fried pomfret, known as zubaidi, graces a fragrant bed of rice in this beloved Kuwaiti specialty. Seasoned to perfection, it delivers a delightful blend of crispy texture and rich flavors.
